text: I have many goals in this life. Some I'm sure I will achieve and others I'm sure I will miss. Regardless of the success or failure of my goals, the ultimate goal is to live a good life. And that goal will definitely be achieved.
Beauty can be found all around us. Our eyes and ears are the gateway to wonderful sights and sounds. It is up to us to open our eyes to see and our ears to hear this beautiful world!
The world can be a wonderful place when we all come together and unite in one purpose. The purpose can change and does not need to remain the same. The greater good is always a great purpose!
